wave_0_per_frame6=t6 = q6;

wave_0_per_frame8=t7 = 1;
wave_0_per_point1= //myFreq     = log10(log10(sample)+3)*10000;
wave_0_per_point2= //myAltFreq  = time*0.2+myFreq*4-0.8; 
wave_0_per_point3= //fade       = 20*(1.1-myFreq);//*value1 
wave_0_per_point4= t7 = -t7;
wave_0_per_point5= pi = asin(1);
wave_0_per_point6= n = 180;
wave_0_per_point7= rd = 0.075;//+(value1*10+1)*((sample*512)%2)*0.02;
wave_0_per_point8= xx = sin(sample*pi*4+(t7+1)*t8)*0.5 + cos(sample*pi*n)*rd*sin(sample*pi*4+(t7+1)*t8);
wave_0_per_point9= yy = cos(sample*pi*4+(t7+1)*t8)*0.5 + cos(sample*pi*n)*rd*cos(sample*pi*4+(t7+1)*t8);
wave_0_per_point10=zz = sin(sample*pi*n)*rd;
wave_0_per_point11=
wave_0_per_point12=d = sqrt( xx*xx + yy*yy + zz*zz);
wave_0_per_point13=d1 = 1;
wave_0_per_point14=xx = xx*d1;
wave_0_per_point15=yy = yy*d1;
wave_0_per_point16=zz = zz*d1;
wave_0_per_point17=
wave_0_per_point18=w = -d*t5*0;
wave_0_per_point19=s1 = sin(t2*1+w);
wave_0_per_point20=s2 = sin(t3*1+w);
wave_0_per_point21=s3 = sin(t4*1+w);
wave_0_per_point22=c1 = cos(t2*1+w);
wave_0_per_point23=c2 = cos(t3*1+w);
wave_0_per_point24=c3 = cos(t4*1+w);
wave_0_per_point25=
wave_0_per_point26=z = (c3*s1*c2 + s3*s2)*xx - (c3*s1*s2-s3*c2)*yy + c3*c1*zz;
wave_0_per_point27=x1 = (c1*c2*xx + c1*s2*yy - s1*zz);
wave_0_per_point28=y1 = ((s3*s1*c2 - c3*s2)*xx + (s3*s1*s2+c3*c2)*yy + s3*c1*zz);
wave_0_per_point29=
wave_0_per_point30=d = sqrt( x1*x1 + y1*y1);
wave_0_per_point31=w = atan2(x1,y1);
wave_0_per_point32=a = 1;
wave_0_per_point33=zoom = 0.5*atan2(a,a+z)*d;//0.4*atan2(a+d,a+z);//0.5*(1/(z+a));
wave_0_per_point34=x = 0.5 + zoom*sin(w);
wave_0_per_point35=y = 0.5 + zoom*cos(w);
wave_0_per_point36=
wave_0_per_point37=pi3 = 3.1415926*2*0.3333;
wave_0_per_point38=t = sample*6.0 + t3*2;
wave_0_per_point39=c=0.5015;
wave_0_per_point40=
wave_0_per_point41=r = (sin(t      )+1)*c;
wave_0_per_point42=g = (sin(t-  pi3)+1)*c;
wave_0_per_point43=b = (sin(t-2*pi3)+1)*c;

per_frame_1=//wave_a = 0;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=//decay = 0.1;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=tic = min(time-tin,.1);
per_frame_7=tin = time;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=ti = ti + tic*24;
per_frame_10=q1 = above(ti,1);
per_frame_11=ti = ti*below(ti,1);
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=t2 = t2 + tic*bass*bass;
per_frame_16=t2 = t2*below(t2,.01);
per_frame_17=q5 = equal(t2,0);
per_frame_18=q5 = 1-tic*(.5 + .1*bass*bass);
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=//t2 = 1-t2;
per_frame_21=//q5 = t2;
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=vt = vt + bass*mid*treb*tic*.2;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=bt = bt + bass*tic*.4;
per_frame_27=mt = mt + mid*tic*.4;
per_frame_28=tt = tt + treb*tic*.4;
per_frame_29=q2=bt;
per_frame_30=q3=mt;
per_frame_31=q4=tt;
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=q10 = vt;
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=q11 = .5 + .25*sin(bt*1.12);
per_frame_36=q12 = .5 + .25*sin(bt*0.98);
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=monitor = above(bass*mid*treb,int(rand(1001))*.001*2);
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=q20=aspecty;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`float error     = 2;        // maximum random pixel offset
warp_6=`float diffusion = 0.005;      // dither strength
warp_7=`float fadeout   = -0.002;    // may be minor 1/256 due to the error diffusion dither;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw*1.5 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_10=`float magic = lum(GetPixel(lerp(uv_orig,uv, 4))) - lum(GetBlur3(lerp(uv_orig,uv,0)));
warp_11=`uv = lerp(uv_orig,uv, magic*12 ) + (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*texsize.zw*error;
warp_12=`ret = tex2D(sampler_pw_main,uv)+(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv)-0.5)*diffusion + fadeout;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`float2 uvm = frac(uv + time*.0);
comp_4=`
comp_5=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uvm);
comp_6=`float diff = 1-length(ret.xy-GetBlur1(uvm).xy)*3.5;
comp_7=`diff *=1-length(ret.xy-GetBlur2(uvm).xy)*1;
comp_8=`ret.xy *= diff;
comp_9=`ret.z = 0;
comp_10=`
comp_11=`//ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uvm);
comp_12=`ret.x=treb*.9*roam_sin.y*.4-ret.x;
comp_13=`ret.y=mid *.9*roam_cos.y*.5-ret.y;
comp_14=`ret.z=bass*.9*roam_sin.x*.3-ret.z;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`}
